feed.title: Cal.com Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.4.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • chore: update platform billing plans by @Ryukemeister in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16233
  • fix: check profiles and orgId from user.profiles apiv2 by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16249
  • fix: UI Breaks When Entering a Long Username in Profile Settings by @C-W-D-Harshit in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16304
  • chore: [app-router-migration] - settings/teams/[id]/sso is not needed by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16288
  • fix: round robin event rejection problem by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16279
  • fix: permissions issue in pr labeler by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16245
  • feat: :sparkles: support for adding script url added for umami by @AkashRajpurohit in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16300
  • fix: Workflow action 'email to host' only sends to one host of team e… by @Amit91848 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14767
  • fix: atoms icons and build issues by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16248
  • fix: create event type refresh bug by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16301
  • fix: Disable ICS file generation when destination calendar is Outlook by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16247
  • chore: Make how E2E test suite checks for Stripe consistent by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16319
  • feat: Multiple Options Paste and Routing Form improvements related to Select fields by @danrfletcher in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15706
  • refactor: bulk update modal logic shifted to web wrapper by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16315
  • fix: error message when email exists by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16022
  • chore: v4.4.3 by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16321

New Contributors

  • @C-W-D-Harshit made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16304
  • @AkashRajpurohit made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16300
  • @danrfletcher made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15706

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.4.2...v4.4.3

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.4.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: delete attribute member relation if no input is provided by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16298
  • fix: Migrates E2E reports to external repo by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16326
  • revert: "fix: uncaught types errors in invite members team handler (#1… by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16322
  • chore: rename calendar settings atom by @Ryukemeister in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16329
  • fix: visiting organization without access shows empty page by @Shaik-Sirajuddin in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15103
  • fix: fixing i18n key signing_up_terms is lost by @nusr in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16338
  • fix: multiple_duration_timeUnit_short Chinese translation by @nusr in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16339
  • feat: Add rescheduledBy & canceledBy fields in the DB by @Amit91848 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15337
  • chore: Make URLs for terms and privacy policy customizable via .env vars by @CodeShakingSheep in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16350
  • fix: fix some missing translation by @nusr in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16351
  • feat: add recurringEvent attribute to api/v2/event-types by @SomayChauhan in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16251
  • fix: Text for cookie consent checkbox in various languages by @CodeShakingSheep in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16355
  • feat: bookingFields identifier supports - and _ characters by @ArnavNath550 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16353
  • feat: tracking and displaying last used login method by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16356
  • feat: block pending meetings for requires confirmation by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16335
  • fix: color restrictions issue by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16360
  • fix: Undefined user in insights data by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16365
  • fix: Avoid typescript error for Nextjs usePathname() by @nebulade in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16368
  • fix: More Stability for FormBuilder by unit tests by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16129
  • fix: API v2 E2E Docker rate limiting by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16374
  • chore: v4.4.4 by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16372

New Contributors

  • @nusr made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16338
  • @CodeShakingSheep made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16350
  • @ArnavNath550 made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16353
  • @nebulade made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16368

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.4.3...v4.4.4

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.4.5
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • chore: App Router Migration - Fix metadata util used in App Router and remove duplicate code by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16346
  • feat: V2 api - use license key server by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16370
  • fix: require confirmation cal video bug by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16376
  • chore: Add Replexica to CI by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16306
  • chore: Use pull-request feature from Replexica by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16383
  • chore: display first 3 organizers photo in round robin event by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16331
  • fix: Move future/workflow/[workflow] getStaticProps into separate file by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16124
  • fix: api v2 booking controller with api key by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16358
  • fix: use userPhone instead of phone for switch case by @nicmosc in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16384
  • fix: allow all sign in methods when being invited by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/13436
  • chore: switch pr's i18n job to in-branch mode by @maxprilutskiy in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16390
  • perf: Removed unused attendees count by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16391
  • refactor: improve team members page performance by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16155
  • chore: Bulk update desc by @SySagar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16343
  • feat: Org Webhooks API V2 by @alishaz-polymath in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16274
  • chore: Move Replexica to run on pushes to main by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16394
  • fix: GitHub access token for Replexica by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16395
  • feat: update translations by @calcom-bot in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16396
  • feat: Add more AI translation languages by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16381
  • perf: run parallel bookings queries by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16398
  • feat: update translations by @calcom-bot in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16400
  • feat: Implement editable OOO events feature by @Souptik2001 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15932
  • fix: Flicker b/w Dark and Light theme by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16042
  • fix: Add version to embed.js and preview.js by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16182
  • chore: App Router Migration - Ensure isBookingPage is correctly flagged before being passed to PageWrapper by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16362
  • fix: Set teamMemberEmail server side for CRM RR Skip by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16367
  • chore: v4.4.5 by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16402

New Contributors

  • @nicmosc made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16384
  • @maxprilutskiy made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16390
  • @calcom-bot made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16396

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.4.4...v4.4.5

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.4.6
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: Broken reschedule page for migrated user's booking through request-reschedule by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16068
  • feat: update translations by @calcom-bot in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16401
  • perf: Improve loading existing bookings via API getBusyTimes by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16410
  • chore: reorganize event type files by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16393
  • fix: recurring booking idempotency key after cancel by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16414
  • fix: Fallback to the default language (en) on Admin page in User edit form by @pietrzakacper in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16425
  • feat: synthflow app by @PeerRich in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16420
  • feat: add "somewhere else" as a location option by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15108
  • feat: update translations by @calcom-bot in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16436
  • fix: Unconfirmed booking busytimes of other users being fetched in troubleshooter by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16439
  • feat: browser push notifications by @thepradipvc in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14888
  • chore: App router migration (/workflows) fix metadata and remove duplicate file for getStaticProps by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16452
  • feat: update translations by @calcom-bot in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16462
  • chore: Log cold starts of /v1/slots by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16468
  • chore: App router migration - Add method to BookingRepository & Extract /videos/**/* into /modules and /lib by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16466
  • chore: App router migration - /auth/forgot-password/*, /auth/login, /auth/logout by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16467
  • chore: Add 3 more languages to AI translations by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16469
  • test: Unit Tests for FormBuilderField and BookingFields components by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16162
  • feat: update translations by @calcom-bot in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16475
  • fix: Adding yearly title to preview page by @darshil89 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16441
  • feat: availability in instant meeting by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16424
  • feat: update translations by @calcom-bot in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16477
  • chore: Update bug_report.yml by @PeerRich in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16089
  • chore: Remove unnecessary log by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16426
  • chore: v2 bump platform libraries by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16473
  • fix: use dbWrite in OrganizationsTeamsRepository by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16485
  • chore: App-router-migration /auth/new and /auth/saml-idp by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16447
  • chore: App-router-migration /auth/error, /auth/platform, /auth/oauth2 by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16445
  • fix: api v2 booking controller handle error codes by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16486
  • chore: App router migration - Add env variables for /auth route group by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16488
  • chore: Remove obsolete docker compose version by @ImBIOS in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16419
  • fix: meeting url missing in workflow email by @CarinaWolli in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16434
  • chore: Edit deploy script to enable /future/auth by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16492
  • fix: v1 API Teams access by @alishaz-polymath in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16403
  • fix: Add jitter when Outlook requests are throttled by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16484
  • ci: adds basic visual regression testing for icons by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16408
  • feat: attributes v2 api by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16461
  • fix: v2 api fix recurring booking by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16472
  • feat: Ability to Hyperlink text in Checkbox on Additional Questions by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15194
  • chore: App-router-migration(/availability) add pages / extract components into /module by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16404
  • perf: Separate OR clauses from Insights counts by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16502
  • chore: Add next batch of languages to AI translations by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16506
  • feat: update translations by @calcom-bot in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16508
  • chore: v4.4.6 by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16507

New Contributors

  • @pietrzakacper made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16425
  • @darshil89 made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16441

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.4.5...v4.4.6

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.4.7
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: Add step in team creation form for selecting event type and create a team event by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15286
  • chore: improved lastused login method flow by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16511
  • fix: flakyness on booking questions tests by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16513
  • refactor: allow managed event tests parallel runs by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16113
  • feat: hashed link retrieval from event types v1 api by @JOSU9435 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16437
  • refactor: update AppProvidersAppDir to align more closely with AppProviders (used for Pages Router) by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16496
  • fix: Left align instead of right aligned rating feedback in insights by @alishaz-polymath in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16521
  • chore: Add last batch of languages to translate with AI by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16520
  • chore: make generic function for separate or queries by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16522
  • fix: Broken preview deployments by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16523
  • chore: improve typing of runSeparateQueriesForOrStatements by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16525
  • chore: App-router-migration(/apps) fix metadata, extract components into /module and finish migration by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16354
  • feat: update translations by @calcom-bot in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16524
  • chore: App router migration - (/more, /maintenance, /connect-and-join, /upgrade) finish migration by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16497
  • chore: updated cookie usage i18n by @PeerRich in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16530
  • chore: get platform me from trpc instead of apiv2 by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16515
  • chore: booker atom username / teams props enabled queries by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16514
  • feat: OOO webhook and zapier by @alannnc in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15434
  • fix: #16083. booking location editable by @emiliodeg in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16142
  • fix: Invalid options for Select and MultiSelect when both legacy and new options(i.e. with and without id are present) by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16509
  • fix: fixed the flaky e2e tests that failed the most times and refactor by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16364
  • feat: update translations by @calcom-bot in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16532
  • chore: App router migration - general settings by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16312
  • chore: fix input DTOs for v2 calendar busy times endpoint by @Ryukemeister in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16526
  • chore: Fix bundle error occurring in Next.js Bundle Analysis CI job by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16548
  • chore: Update and rename bug_report.yml to bug_report.md by @PeerRich in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16556
  • perf: Modified Insights view to use UNION for user/team bookings by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16558
  • perf: use isTeamBooking filter in all of Insights by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16561
  • perf: Server-Side Data Fetching in App Router: SettingsLayout / AdminLayout by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16537
  • chore: App router migration - /attributes, /privacy, /dsync, /license-key under /settings route group by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16406
  • chore: App router migration - settings/platform/**/*, settings/organizations/new and settings/organizations/[id]/* by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16334
  • fix: Skip COEP tests in embed by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16572
  • chore: Remove separate OR queries for Insights by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16568
  • fix: rescheduled by missing encoding by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16573
  • chore: Release v4.4.7 by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16574

New Contributors

  • @JOSU9435 made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16437
  • @emiliodeg made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16142

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.4.6...v4.4.7
